OrderShare.name: OrderShare
OrderShare.description: Represents a sharing entry on an Order.

OrderAccessLevel.description: Level of access that the user or group has to the order.

OrderId.description: ID of the order associated with this sharing entry. This field can't be updated.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the user or group that has been given access to the order. This field can't be updated.
